summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Dentis3 Care dental clinic website. Backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend mostly functional with minor mobile responsiveness issue.

ui_bugs.issue: Mobile hamburger menu button not visible on mobile viewport (375px). Desktop navigation remains visible on mobile instead of switching to hamburger menu.

design_issues.issue: Minor React console warning about non-boolean JSX attribute

passed_tests: Backend API root endpoint (200)
Contact form submission API (200)
Appointment booking API (200)
Get contacts API (200)
Get appointments API (200)
API error validation (422 responses)
Homepage loads with hero section and animations
All navigation links work (Home, About, Services, Contact)
About page displays doctors info and photo correctly
Services page shows all 5 service cards with descriptions
Contact form frontend submission works
Appointment booking form frontend submission works
WhatsApp button has correct link (+91 9004332292)
Google Maps embed displays correctly
Footer renders with copyright and services
Button hover effects work correctly
Color palette uses correct primary green (#4CAF50)
CSS animations work on all pages
Forms are accessible on mobile devices
Content scales properly across desktop, tablet, mobile
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix mobile hamburger menu visibility issue in Header.js. The mobile menu button is not showing on mobile viewport (375px) and desktop navigation is not hiding properly. Check Tailwind CSS classes: mobile button needs to be visible on small screens (sm:block) and desktop nav should be hidden on small screens (hidden md:flex).
